steps.title: Butcher animals to collect bones.
steps.content: Butcher animals to collect bones. Select the knife icon from your livestock panel, and as your dwarves butcher creatures , you'll get bones. [1] X Research source The animals must have skeletons, like cows, roosters, and pigs.

steps.title: The animal died of starvation.
steps.content: The animal died of starvation. You must use the Butcher to kill the animal. If it died for any other reason, like starvation, you won't be able to get bones from it.

steps.title: The corpse was a sentient creature.
steps.content: The corpse was a sentient creature. You're unable to get bones from anything considered a sentient creature, including enemies and other dwarves.
